span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 v. 下降： to lead or extend downward
【例】 the pathway descends to the river bank 通道一直向下延伸到河岸
【近】 dip, fall, plunge, sink
【反】 arise, ascend, climb, mount, upsweep, upturn
【考法 2】 v. 世代相传： to originate or come from an ancestral stock or source, to pass by inheritance
【例】 The house has descended through four generations.
【例】 a tradition descending from colonial days
【记】 de 向下 + scend 爬；de 音：低+ ascend scend 音：升的; 形近decreased 减少
【另】 ascend 攀登 上升，condescend 屈尊，descend 下降 下来，transcend 超越，胜过
